articles.title: Russia blames software failure after space station briefly thrown off course - Rappler
articles.description: NASA says the 7 crew members aboard – two Russian cosmonauts, three NASA astronauts, a Japanese astronaut and a European space agency astronaut from France – were never in any immediate danger
articles.content: Vladimir Solovyov, designer general at Energia, a Russian space agency company, sought to reassure international partners that the incident had been contained and said cosmonauts would have it up and… [+13 chars]

articles.description: Changpeng Zhao in focus as exchange also plans to wind down European derivatives business

articles.author: Sophie Collins
articles.title: Ireland's vaccination rollout is 'great example' to the rest of Europe - Irish Mirror
articles.description: 71% of the population are now fully vaccinated against severe side effects of Covid-19 while 86% are partially covered
articles.content:
HSE Chief Paul Reid has said that Irelands vaccination rollout proves to be a great example to other European countries as walk-in centres get ready to open this weekend.
